title: Landslide Early Warnings for 6 districts
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Building Research Organization has issued Landslide Early Warnings for six districts with effect from 13:30 PM on Friday (13).
Long queues for fuel as curfew lifted briefly on Friday (13)
Wimal & Co. oppose Ranil’s appointment, If Mahinda Rajapaksa stepped down earlier violence could have been prevented
Sri Lanka Freedom Party rejects offer to form government with Ranil Wickremesinghe
SJB protests the appointment of Ranil Wickremesinghe as Prime Minister
